Definition 2.1. If Unknown identifier `S_f`S_f is coprime to Unknown identifier `P`P, then divisibility of by Unknown identifier `P`sorry ^ sorry : ?m.5P^Unknown identifier `k`k forces divisibility of Unknown identifier `P`P by Unknown identifier `P`sorry ^ sorry : ?m.5P^Unknown identifier `k`k.

lemma prop2_5_pow_dvd_P1_of_pow_dvd_P2_fX (P P : Polynomial ) (hP : Irreducible P) (f : (Polynomial Ideal.span ({P} : Set (Polynomial ))) +* (Polynomial Ideal.span ({P} : Set (Polynomial )))) (fX : Polynomial +* Polynomial ) (hIJ : (Ideal.span ({P} : Set (Polynomial )) : Ideal (Polynomial )) Ideal.comap fX (Ideal.span ({P} : Set (Polynomial )))) (hf_ind : Ideal.quotientMap (I := Ideal.span ({P} : Set (Polynomial ))) (Ideal.span ({P} : Set (Polynomial ))) fX hIJ = f.toRingHom) (Sf : Polynomial ) (hSf : fX P = Sf * P) : IsCoprime Sf P k : , P : Polynomial , (P ^ k fX P) (P ^ k P) := by intro hcop refine Nat.rec ?_ ?_ intro P _; simp intro k IH P hdiv have hP0 : P 0 := hP.ne_zero have hP_dvd : P fX P := by exact dvd_trans (dvd_pow_self P (Nat.succ_ne_zero k)) hdiv have hP_dvd : P P := prop2_5_dvd_P1_of_dvd_P2_fX ( := ) P P f fX hIJ hf_ind P hP_dvd rcases hP_dvd with P', rfl have hdiv' : P ^ (k + 1) fX P * fX P' := by simpa [map_mul] using hdiv have hdiv'' : P ^ k * P (Sf * fX P') * P := by simpa [pow_succ, hSf, mul_assoc, mul_left_comm, mul_comm] using hdiv' have hdivSf : P ^ k Sf * fX P' := by exact (mul_dvd_mul_iff_right hP0).1 hdiv'' have hcop' : IsCoprime (P ^ k) Sf := by exact (isCoprime_comm).1 (hcop.pow_right (n := k)) have hdivP' : P ^ k fX P' := by exact IsCoprime.dvd_of_dvd_mul_left hcop' hdivSf have hIH : P ^ k P' := IH P' hdivP' simpa [pow_succ, mul_assoc, mul_left_comm, mul_comm] using (mul_dvd_mul_left P hIH)
